name: Caravan to Empire
description:
A snake inspired game, where you build a empire to delay the end of your caravan.

The bigger your caravan is, more food is drained from your supply. Build supply structures to reduce your food usage and increase the resource income.

Gameplay is W, A, S, D or Arrow keys.

The possible recipes with your current resources shows as a transparent version of the building.

Feedback is appreciated.

Thank you for stopping by! :smile:
